document_data.caption: A map showing Cage Street and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Cage Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Cage Street''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Cage Street was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It originated on the southern end of the [[Street of Silver]], branching west through a neighborhood of buildings to end where it merged with [[Shadow Alley]]. [[Mulgomir's Way]] intersected Cage Street close to where it branched from the Street of Silver.
